channel.title: CVE Feed for Buildroot -- Buildroot
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Buildroot -- Buildroot

item.title: CVE-2023-45838|2024-08-02T20:29:32.463Z -- buildroot -- buildroot
item.description: Multiple data integrity vulnerabilities exist in the package hash checking functionality of Buildroot 2023.08.1 and Buildroot dev commit 622698d7847. A specially crafted man-in-the-middle attack can lead to arbitrary command execution in the builder.This vulnerability is related to the `aufs` package.

item.title: CVE-2023-43608|2024-08-02T19:44:43.815Z -- buildroot -- buildroot
item.description: A data integrity vulnerability exists in the BR_NO_CHECK_HASH_FOR functionality of Buildroot 2023.08.1 and dev commit 622698d7847. A specially crafted man-in-the-middle attack can lead to arbitrary command execution in the builder.
